name: art'otel cologne

reviews.title: Functional hotel, fabulous reception staff
reviews.text: I booked two rooms for two nights via lastminute.com - when I chose the mystery hotel option on this website, I was delighted to find I had been allocated the Art'otel for a substantially lower price than I would have paid had I known what the hotel was when I clicked on "book". We arrived at 10.30pm to find the hotel only had one room reserved for us, but as the booking confirmation I had printed off clearly showed two rooms had been booked and paid for,the male receptionist was very quick to find us a second room and upgraded it to a 5th floor room with better views. He was very friendly and obliging.

reviews.title: Friendly, fabulous short stay hotel
reviews.text: The hotel is unremarkable from the outside, and you can actually see the kitchens right at the front of the hotel with all the stainless steel equipment which I didn't like personally. It made the hotel look messy and not very smart. The lobby was nice, but not much in it save for a few funky chairs, minimal I think is the word.....elevators very quick and never had to wait long for one of the two.

reviews.title: Fantastic value and great staff
reviews.text: The rooms were clean, comfortable, but not exceptional. The sink is in the bedroom rather than the bathroom, which doesn't work for me personally, but each to their own. Shower, however, compensated and was very powerful. Good range of toiletries. I think the hotel was quite well-booked when I stayed and the best part was the fact that not once did I hear any noise down the corridor from other guests, it was really quiet and peaceful, no noise from other rooms either.

reviews.title: Modern style by the Rhine
reviews.text: Cannot fault the reception staff, so friendly and courteous. A lovely lady checked us out and we were able to leave our luggage all day until the evening.

reviews.title: Modern Art hotel on the Rhine
reviews.text: overall a good hotel experience.... its a 15 min or so stroll along the Rhine to the Dom and the main central station. The petrol station opposite is 24h if an emergency chocolate bar or drink is required.

reviews.title: clean and modern
reviews.text: Loved the modern minimalist style. Great view of the Rhine from the room and and the elevator, and right next to the chocolate museum. Walking distance to the cathedral and restaurants. The room was clean and the bathroom was excellent. The front desk staff was extremely helpful and accommodating.

reviews.title: Stylish hotel in a nice location
reviews.text: I was very impressed with the style and function of this hotel, located right on the Rhine and within walking distance of all the major Cologne sights, including the cathedral. Even though my room was facing a very busy street, it was very quiet. The bed was great, as was the elegant bathroom. The friendly staff responded very quickly via email to my request for an early check-in and had the room ready when I arrived. My only complaint would be that even though my room was cleaned, the amenities (including coffee) were not replenished. Otherwise, a great stay.

reviews.title: that extra something
reviews.text: no weak point, good location next to the rhine and chocolate museum, super service, nice rooms, free sauna, tasteful design and "artwork" everywhere even in the shower, and just that little extra something that makes it stand out from your occasional unimaginative hotel.

reviews.title: Loved this hotel - different to anywhere we have every stayed before
reviews.text: highly recommended for both business and pleasure

reviews.title: nice and clean
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel with my partner in October last year and thoroughly enjoyed our stay, it was so different to anywhere we have stayed before. I loved the art work that is within the hotel and the glass lift overlooking the river, it gives the hotel a very contemporary, modern feel. The hotel is located at the side of the River Rhine and is within a 20 minute walk of the centre of Cologne. We were greeted at reception by a friendly and polite staff member,

reviews.title: Very close to city
reviews.text: Great location on the river, next to the Lindt chocolate museum and 10 minutes from the city centre

reviews.title: good location and something a bit different
reviews.text: The hotel itself is modern and bright with really good rooms, wet room and great amenities. We upgraded to a river view room but found that there was a lot of noise from cars and trams from a nearly bridge that we couldn't keep the window open...view was good though.

reviews.title: Great location
reviews.text: The staff are very friendly and helpful and the hotel provides limited secure underground parking for 20 Euro per night.

reviews.title: a bit expensive for what it is...
reviews.text: We didn't try the latin fusion restaurant and so can't comment on the food provided.

reviews.title: Friendly staff, good location
reviews.text: We'd go back to this hotel if/when we return to Koln on holiday.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just got back from one night at the Art'otel Cologne. It was a hip hotel full of young people with interesting design elements. Overall I liked the room layout, although the colored glass "wall" separating the shower and toilet from the rest of the room might be too intimate for people sharing a room with a friend. The only real flaw was that our carpet was heavily stained. I did enjoy the late checkout (1:00 p.m. if you ask!), the free wifi, the sauna, and the rooftop lounge area. We had a street-side room but noise wasn't too bad if the window was closed. The location on the river near the Chocolate museum is nice, although if you're looking to use public transit you'll have to walk a bit to reach a station or stop.
reviews.title: Trendy, Fun, Affordable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I stayed at the art'otel Cologne from the 3-5 May 2013. The staff were exceptionally friendly, our room was very spacious, clean and bright and we had all the amenities we needed - free internet, coffee-making facilities etc. The hotel is well located right by the river front with loads of cafes, bars and restaurants nearby - plus the chocolate museum next door! Train station around 20-25 mins walk away.
reviews.title: Faultless relaxing stay

reviews.text: All in all a faultless stay and we would not hesitate for a minute to recommend art'otel.
reviews.title: Great Value in the Centre of Cologne!

reviews.text: I recently stayed here for one night while on business in Cologne. It's really a fantastic hotel in the city centre and right on the river. I was upgraded to an XL room which was a nice surprise and the room really is large. I had a river view with a balcony that was very cool. Not all of the rooms have the balconies that I could see but it's worth asking for one. Probably not great for people who are afraid of heights. It's like being in a glass elevator on the outside of the building.

description: Opening in March 2010, the distinctive art’otel cologne is located in the 100-year-old Rheinauhafen, a former port near the city centre. Hotel’s amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi, business services, on-site dining and meeting facilities, as well as a permanent collection of artwork by Korean-born artist SEO. These works are displayed throughout the hotel gallery, distinguishing our accommodation from other hotels in Cologne.
